# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Prefer styling nav link colors via CSS, not inline styles. Use `.bg-NCCBlue .nav-link { color: white !important; }` and remove `style="color: white;"` from anchor tags in `SiteLayout.cshtml`.

## Code Style
- Use specific formatting rules
- Follow naming conventions
